website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ GP20 projector offers WXGA (1,280-by-800) resolution and a light source meant to last the life of the projector, to keep running costs low.
pros: Reads files from USB memory keys, SD cards, and internal RAM
LED light source rated at up to 30,000 hours
cons: Shows scaling artifacts at its native resolution

customer_reviews.title: Color is great. Brightness cannot compare as it is only 700 ...
customer_reviews.text: Color is great. Brightness cannot compare as it is only 700 lumens. Heavier unit if you travel with other stuff in our brief case?, very slow remote and manual entry. Hope that is an update on the software? Can anyone tell me if and where can I update the unit software? It has great features: wifi, usb, full HDMI input, speaker, It is not as user friendly great bulb life in the 20,000 hr. range!, Love the tripod mount which I used it with a camera tripod so it can be place anywhere in a crowded hall or room. I read that it does not project MP4 video?
customer_reviews.author: Lion Michael

customer_reviews.title: Let me get straight into what I like and what I don't like What I like-- The ...
customer_reviews.text: Let me get straight into what I like and what I don't like What I like-- The picture quality is good with colours looking good Options for wall color Little ambient light is no problem for this Wish it wasn't-- The fan noise is a slight distraction. But fan noise reduces, once it is playing a source. I don't know the reason behind this. It is slightly bulky when compared to my other LED projectors I had in the past. Media player didn't play mp4 format.
customer_reviews.author: Rense Abraham Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Alternate to Large TVs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Projector instead of buying a big LED TV. I did not go wrong. Pros: Its very compact. It does not take much space. Even when its near the wall, we can see the larger projection. Few of the projectors does not have this feature. Since its LED, the life of the light bulbs are longer hence greater life time. Cons: 700 Lumen is bit less compared to other projectors in market. But its a personal choice.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik V. Srinivasan

customer_reviews.title: Fan is very noisy
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality and brightness however the fan is extremely noisy. I have a surround 5.1 channel home theater and even with the volume turned up half way the fan in the projector is makes enough noise to be heard. Not only is the fan loud but it varies in speed so you can't get used to the buzz it makes. I've only used it for gaming, so I'm not sure if this only applies to games, but since that is almost the only thing I use it for I'm rating it based on this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Boloyde

customer_reviews.title: very nice. the hdmi to mini usb (mhl) cable does ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice. the hdmi to mini usb (mhl) cable does not work though on a note 3. maybe I did something wrong here. I don't mind. I'm using another cable that works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Krisanto Karlo Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE PROJECTOR IF AT THE RIGHT PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for under $400 via Amazon Warehouse Deals & am very satisfied with my purchase. Its my first projector & really don't have anything to compare it to but definitely like projection more than tv now. The only thing I've seen that seems to be of concern to some people is an occasional rainbow affect during mostly non-HD content.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES GLYMPH SR.

customer_reviews.title: Great for home cinema or avid hander
customer_reviews.text: I originally owned LG projector a mini projector but I find this one to be much more bright and the picture to be a lot better out of the box. set up took a matter of minutes. overall I would rate this is one of the best projectors I've ever owned
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Reached Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Best product at best cost. The specs provided are worth for given price. But for iPhone and android lollipop its not working as expected. Hope it need still a betterment on mobile side
customer_reviews.author: lokesh

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wireless USB adapter does not transmit fast enough data to the projector to show smooth transitions.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge H Kurita

customer_reviews.title: Too much noise On the other hand,
customer_reviews.text: Too much noise On the other hand, is very good
customer_reviews.author: hyy683

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pricture clarity.....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality; don't have previous experience to compare to any other LED projectors; but I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding in every respect
customer_reviews.text: I gave a one star review previously because the remote didn't work. Evaluated several other units but ended up reordering Benq GP20. It arrived one day ahead of schedule. And it worked flawlessly, remote and all. I love the features of this projector and the picture is really excellent even comparing to other projectors in the 3K lumen range.
customer_reviews.author: Med A

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The price for this product falls just right after I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Matheus

customer_reviews.title: The product is indeed good, but marketing is bad
customer_reviews.text: The same product which i bought for $485.98 is not being sold for whopping $86 less. I am going to return this product. The product is indeed good, but marketing is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ratish

customer_reviews.title: Good projector with limited playback file format
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. A little on the heavier side because the power adapter is inside the projector.It can project easily over 120" image in a darkroom. Pros: 700 lumens bright. Nice reproduction of the image. wireless connectivity with the computer. Cons: The video format files that it plays are very limited compared to similar projectors. Does not support mp4 format.
customer_reviews.author: Cellreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Un-boxing video
customer_reviews.text: Initial impressions are good with this projector. I'm not very well versed in projector-speak, so I'll leave technical reviews to those more qualified, but in the mean time I wanted to respond to all the "what's in the box?" questions with an un-boxing video. Hope this helps-
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Coward

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light-weight projector that fits the bill perfectly. The only thing I would change is when I connect wirelessly I have to disconnect from my wireless so I cannot use Internet. But every thing else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Mullinax

customer_reviews.title: The picture is clear and bright enough. The so ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture is clear and bright enough. The so called wireless function is not very well developed. You can hardly do anything through wifi directly. The noise is large.
customer_reviews.author: Xue

customer_reviews.title: Can I use multiple projectors at the same time controlled ...
customer_reviews.text: Can I use multiple projectors at the same time controlled by the same notebook? I have single one person doing the presentation, but the room is very big, and need to use 3 projectors. Please advise me, if you have such an experience. Many thanks. George.
customer_reviews.author: Gui-Rong Liu

customer_reviews.title: This projector is great. I had ml550 for sometime
customer_reviews.text: This projector is great. I had ml550 for sometime, but this is brighter than that. And the picture quality is just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: krishi045

product_meta.title: BenQ GP20 Wireless Ultra-Lite LED 700 Lumen Projector
product_meta.description:
THE PERFECT FAMILY GETAWAY COULD BE FOUND IN JUST ABOUT ANY CORNER
Don't let a busy day-to-day schedule get in the way of spending quality time with your family. Light and compact at 1.5 kg, the BenQ GP20 is an Ultra-Lite LED 700 Lumen Projector powered by short-throw projection technology to turn every room of the house into a fun audiovisual retreat instantly. All you need is a meter to get a large 40" picture. Featuring 720p HD resolution, two built-in 3W speakers powered by SRS surround sound, 3D-ready projection, and unparalleled multimedia connectivity, the GP20 is always ready to give you a brilliant high-definition movie up close without the hassle of additional set-ups. So get ready to explore, discover, and enjoy unlimited fun possibilities together.

Unparalleled connectivity with support for a variety of media formats, wireless, and MHL.View larger The GP20 user interface is styled to ensure a user friendly experience.View larger UNTETHERED CONTROL WITH WIRELESS DISPLAY
Enjoy movies at home, invite friends over to watch the big game, or get into intense video game action with more freedom than ever. Thanks to Wireless Display functions that allow you to connect to the GP20 via NB, PC or your mobile devices. EZ QPresenter 2.0 for PC offers wireless connectivity from your PC to the GP20, with the option to extend to a secondary display or project streaming video directly from your PC or NB. Download the easy-to-use iOS EZ QPresenter 2.0 app to an iPhone or iPad and take your presentation materials with you anywhere. Project PDF, MS Office, and iWorks documents on the GP20 directly from your mobile devices. The app also offers instant access to your cloud storage with Dropbox streaming.

ENJOY BIG SCREEN FUN WITH YOUR ANDROID DEVICES
Now you can share your loved content from your Android devices with your family and friends on big screen. GP20 features MHL function and allows you to mirror the movie, games from your android devices to big screen. Also, your device is being charged while you're using it, so the fun never stops.

CRISP, CLEAR CINEMATIC PICTURE QUALITY AND OPTIMAL ENERGY EFFICIENCY WITH LED PROJECTION TECHNOLOGY
The GP20 utilizes RGB LEDs as the light source to give you incredible, color-rich images with 10000:1 contrast ratio and 100% NTSC color gamut, making photos and movies much more enjoyable. Under the Eco Mode, the GP20 is able to perform up to 30,000 hours without decrease in brightness. With the GP20, there's no need to make image adjustments manually. The automatic keystone feature will do all the work for you, turning misshaped images, graphics and charts into a perfect square. Plus, the Auto Blank feature is included to ensure safe use around young children. It enables the GP20 to detect movements within 20 to 30 centimeters in front of the lens and cut off the projection light automatically.

CONVENIENT AND EASY TO USE WITH AN EXCLUSIVELY DESIGNED USER-FRIENDLY INTERFACE
To ensure a friendly user experience, the GP20 user interface is styled with navigation elements from popular multimedia devices. There is no need for a user manual when everything is this intuitive. With the GP20, there's no need to set the content source manually. Simply plug your devices like SD card, USB drive, and more. It can search the content source automatically.

View larger COLORIFIC
For radiant, life-like color, trust BenQ to deliver. From business presentations and educational venues to spectacular events and home entertainment, Colorific from BenQ is the only way to experience your projected images.


THE BENQ BENEFIT
 * Accurate. Over 1 billion colors – compared to 16.7 million from many LCD projectors
 * Crisp. Bright, high contrast picture – 3x more contrast than similar top-selling LCD models
 * Long-Lasting. Consistent quality – image is the same now and years from now
 * 700lm Ultra-Lite LED Projector(1.5kg)
 * Short-Throw 1.2 (4" at 1 meter distance) Throw Ratio
 * Two 3W Stereo Speakers with SRS HD
 * MHL Connectivity (Android Screen Mirror)
 * Wireless Display (PC/Mobile)
feature_bullets: GP20 features MHL function and allows you to mirror the movie, games from your IOs & Android devices to big screen.

To ensure a friendly user experience, the GP20 user interface is styled with navigation elements from popular multimedia devices that you are familiar with. There is no need for a user manual when everything is this intuitive.

Auto Blank is an eye protection feature designed to ensure safe use around young children. It enables the GP20 to detect movements within 20 to 30 centimeters* in front of the lens and cut off the projection light automatically.
